transparency.description: All agent actions must be logged and visible to users
requirements: Log every agent action to both stdout and logs/
Maintain real-time visibility in Live Agent Console
Never log secrets or sensitive information

safety.description: All changes must pass automated tests before deployment
requirements: All code changes must pass automated tests before merge & deploy
Implement rollback mechanism for failed deployments
Respect resource constraints and budget limits

modularity.description: System must be designed for extensibility and maintainability
requirements: Maintain clear separation between frontend, backend, and agents
Design modular backend ready for future research areas

community_governance.description: Major changes must be subject to community input and voting
requirements: Subject major changes to community vote
Provide mechanisms for community input collection
Use only MIT, Apache-2.0, or BSD-3 licensed dependencies
Maintain open-source licensing for all project components
Ensure code is publicly accessible and transparent
